metadata.othernotes:
Main personality points:

Very aggressive about wanting to do magic tricks. This means being very stubborn to do them, wanting others to see or participate in her magic.
Even though she sucks at magic, she pretends that everything is going alright, or puts others down in order to make herself look good.
Casually suggests or does things that are inappropriate or immoral.
Cute and excited personality. Can be very childish or annoying.
Overreacts to everything
Unintelligent and socially inept when it comes to anything that isn't magic

case.name: Hat drop good
case.description: Sempai gets a good hand, but suddenly her hat falls from the sky and hits her head.

case.name: Hat drop okay
case.description: Sempai gets an okay hand, but suddenly her hat falls from the sky and hits her head.

case.name: Hat drop bad
case.description: Sempai gets a bad hand, but suddenly her hat falls from the sky and hits her head.

case.name: Socks-through-shoes trick
case.description: Sempai performs a magic trick that involves tearing her socks off without taking off her shoes.

case.name: Flying-cape-and-hat trick
case.description: Sempai performs a magic trick that involves making her cape and hat fly into the air.

case.name: Quick-change trick
case.description: Semapi performs a magic trick that involves quickly removing her blazer. However, she accidentally reveals her bra.

case.name: Cards fall out of skirt
case.description: Sempai is revealed to be cheating by keeping extra cards hidden under her skirt.

case.name: Hiding cards under shirt
case.description: Sempai takes off her shirt, while carefully stowing away other hidden cards she had underneath.

case.name: Hidden tapes under bra trick
case.description: Sempai tears off her bra revealing that her nipples are covered in tapes... except they're not.

case.name: Disappearing panties trick
case.description: Sempai implies shoving her panties inside herself. Instead, she performs a magic trick that involves putting her panties in her hands and making them vanish.

notes.note:
Sempai will remove her socks first using magic. However, she realizes how uncomfortable wearing shoes without socks is
Sempai will try hypnosis for one round, but avoids the effects by keeping her eyes shut. This will end up making her lose a hand easily
Possibly have dove fly off with the hat, and have it fail somehow
Masturbation may involve being tied up and toyed, and escaping before she reaches an orgasm.
She will be in a thinking pose. have her hat drop on her head It will be animated. have her tilt her head down and put her hand on her head
Sempai using pullstrings to quickly tear off her blazer. However, in the process of doing that, she accidentally pulls the upper part of her shirt, revealing her bra and cleavage
When Sempai takes off her skirt, she will accidentally reveal playing cards under her skirt suspected on her panties

Sempai think the player is doing it for presentation like magic
